title: ./all.bash Error
body:
by **christophe.hoel**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. ./all.bash
2.
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
expected :
--- cd ../test
N known bugs; 0 unexpected bugs

get :
%%%% making lib9 %%%%

quietgcc -ggdb -I/Users/tof/go/include -O2 -fno-inline -c /Users/tof/go/src/lib9/_p9dir.c
quietgcc -ggdb -I/Users/tof/go/include -O2 -fno-inline -c /Users/tof/go/src/lib9/_exits.c
quietgcc -ggdb -I/Users/tof/go/include -O2 -fno-inline -c /Users/tof/go/src/lib9/argv0.c
quietgcc -ggdb -I/Users/tof/go/include -O2 -fno-inline -c /Users/tof/go/src/lib9/atoi.c
/var/folders/lw/lwqCHwibFFyHAg7uHazH0U+++TI/-Tmp-//ccivRt03.s:unknown:FATAL:can't create 
output file: _exits.o
make: *** [_exits.o] Error 1
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
/var/folders/lw/lwqCHwibFFyHAg7uHazH0U+++TI/-Tmp-//ccFDYhlW.s:unknown:FATAL:can't create 
output file: argv0.o
/var/folders/lw/lwqCHwibFFyHAg7uHazH0U+++TI/-Tmp-//cchxNMj5.s:unknown:FATAL:can't create 
output file: atoi.o
make: *** [argv0.o] Error 1
make: *** [atoi.o] Error 1
/var/folders/lw/lwqCHwibFFyHAg7uHazH0U+++TI/-Tmp-//ccHVvnRM.s:unknown:FATAL:can't create 
output file: _p9dir.o
make: *** [_p9dir.o] Error 1


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOBIN=/Users/tof/bin
GOARCH=386
GOROOT=/Users/tof/go
GOOS=darwin

Which revision are you sync'ed to?  (hg log -l 1)
changeset:   4015:cb140bac9ab0
tag:         tip
user:        Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
date:        Thu Nov 12 14:55:26 2009 -0800
summary:     test/run: unset GREP_OPTIONS



Please provide any additional information below.

$ uname -m
i386
